short_summary: Provide equipment for the correctional service of Canada
description: The Correctional Service of Canada, more specifically CORCAN located at Warkworth Institution in Campbellford, Ontario is looking to procure a laser cutting machine for CORCAN's metal shop. This request for proposal is for the procurement of this equipment. The Contractor must supply, deliver, and install the laser cutting machine at Warkworth Institution and provide training to CORCAN Metal Shop Instructors.
